Detailed Description

Breadth-first search implementation of solver.

Parameters:

openTableSize size of Open Table to allocate (hashtable)

deadlockedBoxesSearch number of boxes to use when testing every possible positions of deadlock

void BotBFS::addTreeNodeToCloseList ( TreeNode *  treeNode  )  [protected, virtual]

Add a new TreeNode to the waiting list at the right position. New Treenode is added TO THE END of the waiting list (breadth-first)
